definition: to decrease gradually or bit by bit
details:
verb
- to decrease gradually or bit by bit
= example: to decrease gradually or bit by bit
= synonyms: pare down
- to remove the edges from and cut down to the desired size
= example: to remove the edges from and cut down to the desired size
= synonyms: trim
- to strip the skin off
= example: to strip the skin off
= synonyms: skin
